"A.P.238/4/9/11:30": "Hmm, this seems to be a place to take a break."

"I wasn't expecting such reliability.
...I'm talking about you."
"Not so long ago you were a new recruit, but now you're already an expert."
"Compared to others in the same amount of time, you've really shown amazing improvement."
"Is it the amount of work you put in, or is it something else? It's a good thing, anyway."
"A lot of things have been happening lately, but with someone like you around, it should all work out."
"Hahahaha! Hey there, participants! I hope you're enjoying yourselves!"
"Huey, Huey! I want to take part too! Let me join in!"
"You're part of the staff... Ahem... time to report the current standing!"
"...Right now, the pair in the lead is the Ranger Jean and the Force Marlu!"
"But it seems like the pair of <%me> and the Hunter Ohza are also working hard!"
"Oh, I think I've heard that name before..."
"Nonetheless, it's neck-and-neck! The ARKS Battle Championship is a fierce struggle! The tide could turn at any moment!"
"Hey, Huey. Aren't you just reading from your notes? How's that fun?"
"The second half of the game begins here, so we expect you to do your best! That's all!"
"Look here, Claris Claes, this is about the participants, so can you please read it properly in future?"
"...Gah, we're losing to them! <%me>! Let's hurry! We'll pull back in the second half!"
